document_data.mainbody:
Lia was a tiefling resident of Elturel that became a refugee due to her peoples exile following the Descent of the city during the late 15 century DR.
She was a compassionate person that strongly believed in cooperation for the greater good of her community.
Lia and her companion Cal followed the group of tieflings led by Zevlor, that collectively traveled together from Elturel to the western city of Baldurs Gate in the . While the group was given shelter from goblin attacks at the Emerald Grove, Lia and Cal believed they should stay and help the groves druids, while their friend Rolan was adamant about arriving in Baldurs Gate as soon as possible.
